titleStmt.title: A friend to navigation plainely expressing to the capacity of the simpler so[rt] the whole misery or foundation of the same art for whose sake, the author hath onely penned this treatise, being himselfe a faithfull good willer thereto.
titleStmt.author: Skay, John.

titleStmt.title: A friend to navigation plainely expressing to the capacity of the simpler so[rt] the whole misery or foundation of the same art for whose sake, the author hath onely penned this treatise, being himselfe a faithfull good willer thereto.
titleStmt.author: Skay, John.

notesStmt.note: Print faded and show-through; pages torn and stained; tables of sines, tangents, etc., at end, partly illegible.
Reproduction of original in the Lambeth Palace Library.
